Fixed. We were generating parameters for the ___run() method in the evaluation
source based on the type name of local variable values, instead of the type name
of the local variable itself.

In this case, a local variable was declared as an Enumeration but its value was
an anonymous inner class instance.

Still getting the same stack trace if the "e" variable is selected in the 
variables view.

This was caused by an unrelated problem in the
EvaluationSourceGenerator.getTypeFromProject() method. We ask for a java element
from the project and then get the type from the returned object by checking what
the returned object is an instanceof (unfortunately). We were missing a case.

I also added NPE protection to this method which should have been there before.
